remarks: Deduction for proving that a restricted class abstraction is a submagma.  (Contributed by AV, 26-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rabsubmgmd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
rabsubmgmd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
rabsubmgmd.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Mgm ) $.
rabsubmgmd.cp $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) /\ ( th /\ ta ) ) ) -> et ) $.
rabsubmgmd.th $e |- ( z = x -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
rabsubmgmd.ta $e |- ( z = y -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
rabsubmgmd.et $e |- ( z = ( x .+ y ) -> ( ps <-> et ) ) $.
rabsubmgmd $p |- ( ph -> { z e. B | ps } e. ( SubMgm ` M ) ) $.
$d .+ z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d M x y $.
$d et z $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps x y $.
$d ta z $.
$d th z $.
